src:
トランプ政権、「パリ協定」離脱を通告…地球温暖化対策

04 Nov 2019, 20:56

　【ワシントン＝船越翔】米国のトランプ政権は４日、地球温暖化対策の国際的枠組み「パリ協定」からの離脱を国連に通告したと発表した。通告から１年後に脱退が完了する。
text:
Trump administration, "Paris Agreement" notice of withdrawal ... Global warming countermeasures

04 Nov 2019, 20:56

[Washington = Sho Funakoshi] The Trump administration in the United States announced on the 4th that it had announced to the United Nations its departure from the international framework "Paris Agreement" for global warming countermeasures. The withdrawal is completed one year after the notification.
